description.text: As a thank you for signing up for emails, take 25% off reg. price styles online. Plus, we're giving you access to exclusive offers, new arrivals, and more.

textElements.headerText: A treat for great customers: 40% off everything. Code THANKS

tapContent.legalOverride: Extra 20% off regular-priced items. Combinable with select offers. Offer valid 8/21/2018 through 8/28/2018 at 11:59 PM ET at Banana Republic and Banana Republic Factory online and in stores in the U.S. (including Puerto Rico). Discount does not apply to clearance, Giftcards, packaging, shipping and handling, applicable taxes or BR Picks, BR Monogram Collection, 100% Cashmere, leather apparel, designer collections & collaborations, The Pride Collection and third party branded merchandise. No adjustments on previous purchases. Not valid for cash or cash equivalent. Cannot be combined with the Banana Republic Friends and Family discount or the Banana Republic Factory Store Friends and Family discount. Cashier enters code at in-store checkout. Customer enters code at online checkout.

tapContent.legalOverride: $15 Adult & $12 Kids Frost-Free Vest : Offer valid 10/6/18 at Old Navy stores in the United States (including Puerto Rico) and at Old Navy online. Excludes Women's Plus and Maternity. Select styles only. While supplies last. No adjustments on previous purchases. Cannot be combined with other offers or discounts, including Gap Inc. employee discount.

contentParameters.imageMap: <map name="map_2"><area shape="rect" coords="3, 3, 596, 328" alt="Join the VIP squad & get an extra 20% off* your first purchase when you open and use a card today. Plus access to the 3 best deals of the year! Apply now." mlink="PD_3" plink="new" href="https://apply.syf.com/eapply/eapply.action?clientCode=OLDNAVY&sitecode=ONBCHR7D1" target="_blank" data-href="https://apply.syf.com/eapply/eapply.action?clientCode=OLDNAVY&sitecode=ONBCHR7D1"></map>

tapContent.legalOverride: *Account Opening Offer: Subject to credit approval. Your new Gap Inc. credit card must be used as sole payment type. Open a new Old Navy Card or Old Navy Visa Card to receive a 20% discount. Valid in the U.S. (including Puerto Rico) only. If new Account is opened in Old Navy stores, discount will be applied to first purchase in store made same day and is not valid to be redeemed online. If new Account is opened at OldNavy.com discount code expires at 11:59p ET ninety (90) days from date of Account open and is not valid to be redeemed in-stores. Not valid at other Gap Inc. brands or in our Clearance Center. Excludes packaging, shipping, gift cards, and taxes. Only one account opening discount per Account. Discount can be combined with only one other offer in a single transaction, except offer cannot be combined with employee discount or 10% 60-day shopping pass offer. Discount value will be equally spread across all eligible items in the transaction. Not responsible for lost or stolen codes. No adjustments to previous purchases

contentParameters.imageMap: <map name="map_3"><area shape="rect" coords="3, 2, 596, 329" alt="Cardmember exclusive. Don't forget, you always earn 5 points for every $1 spent in our brands when you use your Old Navy Card. Plus get a $5 reward for every 500 points!" plink="false" href="#"></map>
